attributes.action: oppose HMRC office closures in Barrow, Kendal and Lancaster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned are seriously concerned about the future of HM Revenue and Customs offices in Barrow, Kendal and Lancaster.
The proposal to close these offices will mean that local people and businesses will be left without access to these services. We are also concerned about the likelihood of staff affected by these closures being able to find alternative work within the local area. We support the PCS campaign to keep these offices open and urge the Government to withdraw the threat of closures.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "oppose HMRC office closures in Barrow, Kendal and Lancaster."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18761


Prime Minister's Office
